channel.title: 5 Years of SaaS Growth: Every Month, Exact Numbers
channel.description:
Nice to see actual numbers for month-by-month growth.
"Below is a month-by-month revenue breakdown for the entire 5 years we’ve been running Freckle, our first (and now only) SaaS."
http://unicornfree.com/2013/5-years-of-saas-growth-every-month-exact-numbers

item.title: 5 Years of SaaS Growth: Every Month, Exact Numbers
item.dc:creator: steve
item.description:
Nice to see actual numbers for month-by-month growth.

“Below is a month-by-month revenue breakdown for the entire 5 years we’ve been running Freckle, our first (and now only) SaaS.”

stackingthebricks.com

5 Years of SaaS Growth - Every Month, Exact Numbers

On January 1st, 2009, we billed the very first customers for our brand new app, Noko Time Tracking. That day, we grossed $288. The first month, $1,500
